results.title: The comparative effectiveness of metformin and risperidone in a rat model of valproic acid-induced autism, Potential role for enhanced autophagy
results.text_hl: The potential efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in preventing and/or controlling @<m>DISEASE_Child_Behavior_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002653 @@@ASD behavioral deficits@@@ was also recently reported.
